https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dvh9DNiQvWFSgwrUXkSBb3AQ5cy.jpg Amaravathi is a 2009 Indian Telugu-language thriller film written and directed by Ravi Babu. The film's lead actors included Sneha, Bhumika Chawla, and Ravi Babu. Sindhura Gadde and Taraka Ratna played supporting roles.[2] The film was released on 3 December 2009 to positive reviews. It was remake of 2002 South Korean film H. Amaravathi
